attributes.additional_details:
This governments recent foray into Immigration law is flawed and ill thought out. Instead of reducing immigration the current law penalizes existing British citizens who live abroad and have a foreign spouse. Disadvantaging them from other British citizens by denying them free movement with their families into the UK. Currently a British citizen with a foreign born spouse must might certain income or asset threshold requirements to return to the UK?

This government is requested to review the current law as enacted.
